trans-unit.source: Provides data for the paint events of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Adja meg a paint események adatait a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> vezérlő.

trans-unit.source: A ChartPaintEventArgs object is used to set chart properties during the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: Egy ChartPaintEventArgs objektum lehet beállítani a diagram a tulajdonságokkal a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint>és <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint>eseményeit a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>vezérlő.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Position%2A> property allows you to position chart elements, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A> property facilitates GDI+ drawing operations.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Position%2A>tulajdonság lehetővé teszi, hogy diagramelemek, és a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A>tulajdonság elősegíti a GDI + rajzműveletek.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Chart%2A> property gives the developer access to the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object, which can be used to set various properties of the chart.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Chart%2A>tulajdonság a fejlesztői hozzáférést ad a legfelső szintű <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>objektum, amely használható a diagram különböző tulajdonságainak beállítása.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Chart%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Chart property allows the developer to set chart properties during the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: A diagram tulajdonság lehetővé teszi, hogy a fejlesztő során diagram tulajdonságának beállítása a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint>és <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint>eseményeit a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>vezérlő.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the hart element.
trans-unit.target: Egy <xref:System.Object>, amely jelöli az diagramja elem.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Use this object property during a painting event to: - Help with the conversion to and from relative and/or absolute chart coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Az objektum tulajdonsággal való kifestési esemény során:-segít az átalakítás irányuló és onnan abszolút vagy relatív diagramkoordinátákkal történjen.

trans-unit.source: - Perform custom drawing using a GDI+ <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: – Hajtsa végre a használatával a GDI + egyéni rajz <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objektum.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Use this object property during a painting event to position a chart element.
trans-unit.target: A kifestési események a objektum tulajdonság segítségével diagramelem helyezze.
